hanzi-su-wiki:
識

Значения

Знание, суждение

Мнемоника

Справа — распознавать вид оружия 戈 по звуку 音. Знающего человека легко распознать по его речи 言.

Варианты

识

rtega_mnemonic:
識識RS
X		know, discriminate
  • in the "fabric" of ancient bookscrolls, lines with words 言 of wisdom are woven 戠 in a definite form
 知

識識RS
识识		know, discriminate
  • the master swordsman handles his sword 戈 without saying a word 言 nor uttering a sound 音
  • ⓢ only 只 words 讠 allow us to know what others know
  • a person who has gathered 戠 a lot of words 言 knows a lot
 知
purpleculture_info:
識 (Trad.: 識)
Pictophonetic: 戠 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 戠 [ zhī ] sword; potter's clay; to gather
heisig_chinese_memo: Discriminating/discerning words from sounds in the middle of a fiesta, and thus gaining some knowledge of what's going on, is quite difficult.
heisig_constituent: discriminating, say, words, keitai, mouth, kazoo, sound, vase, stand up, sun, day, fiesta
heisig_story: A person of discriminating intellect can tell the difference between mere kazoo-buzzing and words spoken wisely.
myStory:
戠 [ショク, シキ, シ]: sword, potter's clay, to gather

быть в сознании - собирать слова как разбитый горшок

говорить охраннику с копьём
koohiiStory1: Words are difficult to discriminate/discern from sounds in the middle of a fiesta.
koohiiStory2: I have discriminating taste. I´d rather listen to the words of a lecture than attend a kazoo concert. (Picture some snobby guy in a tweed jacket turning up his nose at entering a loud raucous kazoo recital).
jp_example_words:
認識(にんしき): recognition, cognizance
良識(りょうしき): good sense
意識(いしき): consciousness, senses
常識(じょうしき): common sense
知識(ちしき): knowledge, information
標識(ひょうしき): sign, mark
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you sound like a drunkard when you say things, people will not think of you as a discerning person. "AWh yeah, that game is greatttt," you say in your drunken slurs. But, really, it sounds like you think all games are great, which isn't all that discriminating of you at all.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture yourself as a drunkard. What sort of discerning things are you saying? What are you trying to discern? Do you know?
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: So, we've figured out that your drunken utterances are not very discerning. But let's think about someone who is discerning. You're sitting next to a Sheikh (しき) (an Arabic leader), and boy do they sound like they know what they are talking about. Maybe it's because he's not drunk like you. He has such discerning taste, that one!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine him saying some very (in your eyes) discerning things about everything around him. Color yourself impressed (and feel the impressed-ness)!
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 戠 (ショク、シキ、シ собирать, склеивать). Не путать: 織 (おる、ショク、シキ плести, ткать).
Ru_Radicals: 戈 (копьё), 日 (день), 立 (стоять), 言 (слово), 音 (звук)
Ru_trainchinese:
shí: (глаг) знать, узнавать
shí: (графема) иметь понимание; знание
zhì: (графема) (книжн.) помнить, запоминать; знак, отметка
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you mix your words (言) with potter's clay (戠) to turn them into knowledge
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Knowledge is not only words but an abstract object that sits in your memory.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " speak " to "戠" sound. The original meaning is to remember and remember. "Shuowen": "Knowledge, often. One said: Knowing. From words, sound." Yang Shuda, "Jiweiju Primary School Shulin." "Interpretation of Knowledge": "According to the common knowledge and precepts, Xu Jungai thinks that the banner word for later generations is inconsistent with the meaning of Congyan, and the one who teaches it should be justice. The general knowledge of the modern language refers to the knowledge and experience of people. Knowledge is the tool of knowledge.... Literacy is divided into three meanings according to the order of events. The first is to remember and the first is; the second is knowledge, and the second is; the last is knowledge, and the third is also." Such as "Zhou Yi. "Big Animal": "A gentleman moves forward with more knowledge of the preface, and his virtue is based on the animal." Kong Yingdashu: "Therefore, remember the words of the previous generation and move toward the virtuous, so that you can hear more and see, and accumulate your own virtue with the animal." The Analects. "Shu Er": "Knowing silently, learning tirelessly, teaching people tirelessly, what is it to me?" Zhu Xi's collection of notes: "Knowledge, remember; silent knowledge, without words but with all the hearts."

" Knowledge " also means knowing and knowing. "Jade articles. Yanbu: "Knowledge, know also." Such as "Poetry. Daya. "Emperor": "If you don't know or don't know, the rule of Shundi." "Historical Records. "The Assassin's Biography": "Ju Qingzhi, Yu Rang paints his body as strong, swallows the charcoal to be dumb, makes the shape unknowable, begging in the city, and his wife does not know."

" Knowledge " means knowledge. Such as "Selected Works. Zhang Pingzi "Tokyo Fu": "I don't know much about my husband. From now on, he knows the virtue of the great man, and it is salty here." "Wen Xin Diao Long. "Cailue": "Wang Yi has knowledge and merit, but brilliant and weak.

" Knowledge " is extended to consciousness and perception. Such as "Selected Works. Yan Yannian "Wu Jun Yong. Ruan Bubing>": "Although Ruan Gong is ruined, knowing secrets is also a hole." Li Shan's note: "Knowledge, the alias of the heart, Zhan Ran does not move the heart, the difference is the right and wrong knowledge." Xiao Yan, Emperor Liang Wu of the Southern Dynasty. Net Karma Fu>: "The sound of love that sees ears and knows is like the return of a bird to the forest."

" Knowledge " also means flag, which is the same as " zhe ". "Release name. "Shi Yanyu": "Knowledge, flag also, there are chapters and knowledge can be viewed." Such as "Han Shu. "Wang Mang Biography": "In the early days, there were hundreds of thousands of people in the capital Wen Qing and Xu thief, and there was no sign or signal to show their knowledge, and it was strange." It also means signs and marks. For example, Cao Zhi of the Three Kingdoms: "During Jian'an, the father Wei Wang ordered his company to make five treasured swords. Three years later, he knew dragons, tigers, bears, horses, and birds."

" Knowledge " also means people and friends you know. For example, in the Tang Dynasty, Qian Qi's "Spring Night Banquet Ren Liukun Ji Zhai": "Xiang Yu meets the old knowledge, I would like to put on her breasts." Liu Yuxi "Yuanri Feelings": "There is no old knowledge in a foreign land.
humanum_short_description_en: From the " speak " to the sound of "戠". The original meaning is to remember and remember.
humanum_full_description:
從「言」，「戠」聲。本義是記識、記得。《說文》：「識，常也。一曰：知也。从言，戠聲。」楊樹達《積微居小學述林．釋識》：「按識訓常，許君蓋以為後世之旗幟字，然與从言之義不合，當以訓知者為正義。今語通言知識，指人之學問經驗為言，然知識之具，實由於記識。……識字依事之先後分三義，最先為記識，一也；認識次之，二也；最後為知識，三也。」如《周易．大畜》：「君子以多識前言往行，以畜其德。」孔穎達疏：「故多記識前代之言，往賢之行，使多聞多見，以畜積己德。」《論語．述而》：「默而識之，學而不厭，誨人不倦，何有於我哉？」朱熹集注：「識，記也；默識，不言而存諸心也。」

　　「識」也表示知道、認識。《玉篇．言部》：「識，認識也。」如《詩．大雅．皇矣》：「不識不知，順帝之則。」《史記．刺客列傳》：「居頃之，豫讓又漆身為厲，吞炭為啞，使形狀不可知，行乞於市，其妻不識也。」

　　「識」表示知識。如《文選．張平子〈東京賦〉》：「鄙夫寡識，而今而後，乃知大漢之德馨，咸在於此。」《文心雕龍．才略》：「王逸博識有功，而絢綵無力。」

　　「識」引申為意識、知覺。如《文選．顏延年〈五君詠．阮步兵〉》：「阮公雖淪迹，識密鑒亦洞。」李善注：「識，心之別名，湛然不動謂之心，分別是非謂之識。」南朝梁武帝蕭衍〈淨業賦〉：「觀耳識之愛聲，亦如飛鳥之歸林。」

　　「識」也表示旗幟，同「幟」。《釋名．釋言語》：「識，幟也，有章識可按視也。」如《漢書．王莽傳下》：「初，京師聞青、徐賊眾數十萬人，訖無文號旌旗表識，咸怪異之。」又表示標誌、標記。如三國魏曹植〈寶刀賦〉：「建安中，家父魏王乃命有司造寶刀五枚，三年乃就，以龍、虎、熊、馬、雀為識。」

　　「識」還表示認識的人、朋友。如唐代錢起〈春夜宴任六昆季宅〉：「向隅逢故識，茲夕願披襟。」劉禹錫〈元日感懷〉：「異鄉無舊識，車馬到門稀。」
humanum_short_description: 從「言」，「戠」聲。本義是記識、記得。

Heisig: A person of discriminating intellect can tell the difference between mere kazoo-buzzing and words spoken wisely.
Chinese: Discriminating/discerning words from sounds in the middle of a fiesta, and thus gaining some knowledge of what's going on, is quite difficult.
koohii1: Words are difficult to discriminate/discern from sounds in the middle of a fiesta.
koohii2: I have discriminating taste. I´d rather listen to the words of a lecture than attend a kazoo concert. (Picture some snobby guy in a tweed jacket turning up his nose at entering a loud raucous kazoo recital).
Meaning: knowledge
Hanzi: 识
Story: Knowledge is not only words but an abstract object that sits in your memory.
Kind: traditional

良識(りょうしき): good sense
意識(いしき): consciousness, senses
常識(じょうしき): common sense
知識(ちしき): knowledge, information
標識(ひょうしき): sign, mark

從「 言 」，「 戠 」聲。本義是記識、記得。《說文》：「識，常也。一曰：知也。从言，戠聲。」楊樹達《積微居小學述林．釋識》：「按識訓常，許君蓋以為後世之旗幟字，然與从言之義不合，當以訓知者為正義。今語通言知識，指人之學問經驗為言，然知識之具，實由於記識。……識字依事之先後分三義，最先為記識，一也；認識次之，二也；最後為知識，三也。」如《周易．大畜》：「君子以多識前言往行，以畜其德。」孔穎達疏：「故多記識前代之言，往賢之行，使多聞多見，以畜積己德。」《論語．述而》：「默而識之，學而不厭，誨人不倦，何有於我哉？」朱熹集注：「識，記也；默識，不言而存諸心也。」 「 識 」也表示知道、認識。《玉篇．言部》：「識，認識也。」如《詩．大雅．皇矣》：「不識不知，順帝之則。」《史記．刺客列傳》：「居頃之，豫讓又漆身為厲，吞炭為啞，使形狀不可知，行乞於市，其妻不識也。」 「 識 」表示知識。如《文選．張平子〈東京賦〉》：「鄙夫寡識，而今而後，乃知大漢之德馨，咸在於此。」《文心雕龍．才略》：「王逸博識有功，而絢綵無力。」 「 識 」引申為意識、知覺。如《文選．顏延年〈五君詠．阮步兵〉》：「阮公雖淪迹，識密鑒亦洞。」李善注：「識，心之別名，湛然不動謂之心，分別是非謂之識。」南朝梁武帝蕭衍〈淨業賦〉：「觀耳識之愛聲，亦如飛鳥之歸林。」 「 識 」也表示旗幟，同「 幟 」。《釋名．釋言語》：「識，幟也，有章識可按視也。」如《漢書．王莽傳下》：「初，京師聞青、徐賊眾數十萬人，訖無文號旌旗表識，咸怪異之。」又表示標誌、標記。如三國魏曹植〈寶刀賦〉：「建安中，家父魏王乃命有司造寶刀五枚，三年乃就，以龍、虎、熊、馬、雀為識。」 「 識 」還表示認識的人、朋友。如唐代錢起〈春夜宴任六昆季宅〉：「向隅逢故識，茲夕願披襟。」劉禹錫〈元日感懷〉：「異鄉無舊識，車馬到門稀。」

shí, zhì
вм. 识
Radicals: 言, 音, 戈  (say, sound, drunkard)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you sound like a drunkard when you say things, people will not think of you as a discerning person. "AWh yeah, that game is greatttt," you say in your drunken slurs. But, really, it sounds like you think all games are great, which isn't all that discriminating of you at all.
Picture yourself as a drunkard. What sort of discerning things are you saying? What are you trying to discern? Do you know?
Reading Mnemonic
So, we've figured out that your drunken utterances are not very discerning. But let's think about someone who is discerning. You're sitting next to a Sheikh (しき) (an Arabic leader), and boy do they sound like they know what they are talking about. Maybe it's because he's not drunk like you. He has such discerning taste, that one!
Imagine him saying some very (in your eyes) discerning things about everything around him. Color yourself impressed (and feel the impressed-ness)!

戈 (копьё), 日 (день), 立 (стоять), 言 (слово), 音 (звук)
Фонетик: 戠 (ショク、シキ、シ собирать, склеивать). Не путать: 織 (おる、ショク、シキ плести, ткать).
